name: Salobre s` Basicals in Historiality of the World
name_original: Salobre s` Basicals in Historiality of the World
description:
Salobre s` Basicals in Historiality of the World is an action-adventure game developed by bnmtyhgunec. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play Salobre s` Basicals in Historiality of the World on PC, Linux and macOS. The game is sold via itch.io.
